title: Ear With Hearing Aid Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Hearing Aid Ear Medium Light Skin Tone
description: An ear with a hearing aid device, representing hearing, auditory assistance, or sound. This specific emoji depicts a medium-light skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the ear with a hearing aid emoji, rendered in a medium-light skin tone, showcases a detailed and respectful representation of auditory assistance.  The hearing aid itself is depicted with subtle, realistic lighting and a smooth finish, seamlessly integrated with the gently rounded contours of the ear.  This emoji on Apple devices promotes inclusivity and awareness, symbolizing hearing, communication, or the use of assistive technology.
